articles.title: Super-outbreaks of fire thunderstorms could change Earth's climate, Australian and US experts warn - ABC News
articles.description: Once exceptionally rare, now fire thunderstorms are near daily events in North America and a top Australian fire scientist has teamed up with US defence researchers to ask the difficult question: If a 'super-outbreak' of them would rival a nuclear winter.
